alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 5:11PM MST until July 25 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Tuba City and Moenkpoi in Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 815 PM MST. * At 509 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain from Tuba City and Moenkopi, to the east and southeast. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tuba City, Moenkopi, Portions of Hopi Reservation and Navajo Reservation east and southeast of Tuba City. This includes the following highways... Highway 160 between mile markers 319 and 327. State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 328...and near mile marker 336. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Moenkopi Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
